subject: Sales
title: Competitive Positioning
description: A fast breakdown of Competitive Positioning for builders.

hook.text: Avis said 'We're number two. We try harder.' It turned a weakness into a powerful competitive position.

buildup.text: Competitive positioning defines where you stand relative to rivals in the buyer's perception.

discovery.text: The key is differentiation. If buyers can't distinguish you from competitors, they default to lowest price.

twist.text: Directly attacking competitors rarely works. Buyers distrust negativity. Lead with your own strengths.

climax.text: Position against competitor weaknesses using your strengths. Be the clear alternative, not the imitation.

punchline.text: Don't imitate the leader. Be the clear alternative.

quiz.question: What happens when buyers can't differentiate between competitors?
options: They default to the lowest price
